paper_abstract: Let H be a Hermitian curve and let Gamma be a conic of PG(2, q(2)). In this paper we determine the possible intersection configurations between Gamma and H under the hypotheses that Gamma and H either share two points with the same tangent lines or contain a common Baer subconic. Moreover, the intersection configurations between a degenerate Hermitian curve and a conic sharing a Baer subconic are also determined.
paper_title: On the intersection of a Hermitian curve with a conic
